TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Ensure that the exchange partners are informed of the capabilities of their partner systems, and the specifics relating to service endpoints, prior to actual MIP4 Information Exchange.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Prior to initiating MIP4 Information Exchange, the exchange partners shall complete and share the MIP4 Joining Questionnaire.
TestCase.TestCaseInput: Use MIP4SLT1_1211 - MIP4-IES_Joining_Questionnaire_v1.0.0.docx as template to be filled in.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is completed when the completed MIP4 Joining Questionnaire is provided, read and understood by the Consumer.
TestCase.TestCaseOutput: The Producer will provide a completed Joining Questionnaire to Consumer.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Consumer will request the completed MIP4 Joining Questionnaire from the Producer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Producer will make available a completed MIP4 Joining Questionnaire.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Consumer will examine the Producer's MIP4 Joining Questionnaire for completeness, including: * The supported exchange patterns * The presence and uniqueness of the source identifier * The MIP4 messages supported * Any caveats regarding the service endpoint * Any caveats regarding the MIP4 payloads. * The provision of the URL for each MIP4 R/R and P/S service WSDL.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The consumer will understand what to expect from the Producer and how to initiate exchange of information.
